channel.title: Bainscape
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2z5ospk.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Links[/b][/u][/center] [center][url=http://bain-forums.net/forums]http://bain-forums.net/forums[/url][/center] [center][url=http://bainscape.sytes.net/highscores/highscores.php]http://bainscape.sytes.net/highscores/highscores.php[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ibg2ya0yj98xuk]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ibg2ya0yj98xuk[/url][/center]
[center][u][b]Why choose BainScape?[/b][/u] BainScape is a server that provides a lasting experience. There is countless things to do before you can ever say - I've done everything there is to do on this server. Everything from 24 skills - including Hunter, Construction and Summoning, 5 levels of Achievement diaries and a vast array of difficult bosses, minigames and wonderful items, you're going to be here for a little while. What's more, BainScape has been running for more than 3 years and certainly has a history to it.
[u][b]- Features -[/b][/u] Always online; run on a powerful dedicated server! 24 skills, fully working! 100% Curses & Prayers A wonderfully made client with plenty of options, including remembering your account Complete summoning with pouch creation, scrolls and familiars! Automatic donation system! Torva/Pernix/Virtus give correct max HP boost Huge online community (Over 30,000 registered members on the forums!) Achievement diaries (Easy, Hard, Medium, Elite, and Master) Great PKing system with a live kill-feed, PK points, and more! Fully working XP counter with fading Loads of bosses; Nex, Corporeal beast, Bork, Avatar of Destruction, and many more... Warrior's guild, Pest control, Barrows, Fight pits,and more minigames! Custom survival minigame - progress through waves as you get buffed or de-buffed depending upon your performance! Full clan chat with working dicing! Overloads & Extreme potions Instant equipment switching Clipped following ...And much more!
[u][b]- Pictures -[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://i43.tinypic.com/18dqtf.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://niggaupload.com/images/IBuW3.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://niggaupload.com/images/091yb.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://niggaupload.com/images/ahprw.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/9UCj4.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zaRTj.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/A7DoO.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/pd4qJ.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/FIokg.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/p8K3I.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Bainscape
item.description:
@111110 wrote:

callmedragon:

Looks WAY too customized

This server has been around for years, and it’s good to have customization and creativity in a server. This is better than all the other shit people host now.

Read full topic

item.title: Bainscape
item.dc:creator: @Burberry Burberry
item.description:
@Burberry wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Links[/center]
[center]http://bain-forums.net/forums[/center]
[center]http://bainscape.sytes.net/highscores/highscores.php[/center]
[center]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ibg2ya0yj98xuk[/center]

[center]Why choose BainScape?
BainScape is a server that provides a lasting experience. There is countless things to do before you can ever say - I’ve done everything there is to do on this server. Everything from 24 skills - including Hunter, Construction and Summoning, 5 levels of Achievement diaries and a vast array of difficult bosses, minigames and wonderful items, you’re going to be here for a little while.
What’s more, BainScape has been running for more than 3 years and certainly has a history to it.

- Features -
Always online; run on a powerful dedicated server!
24 skills, fully working!
100% Curses & Prayers
A wonderfully made client with plenty of options, including remembering your account
Complete summoning with pouch creation, scrolls and familiars!
Automatic donation system!
Torva/Pernix/Virtus give correct max HP boost
Huge online community (Over 30,000 registered members on the forums!)
Achievement diaries (Easy, Hard, Medium, Elite, and Master)
Great PKing system with a live kill-feed, PK points, and more!
Fully working XP counter with fading
Loads of bosses; Nex, Corporeal beast, Bork, Avatar of Destruction, and many more…
Warrior’s guild, Pest control, Barrows, Fight pits,and more minigames!
Custom survival minigame - progress through waves as you get buffed or de-buffed depending upon your performance!
Full clan chat with working dicing!
Overloads & Extreme potions
Instant equipment switching
Clipped following
…And much more!

- Pictures -[/center]
